uvi.product_version: versions from v4.19 to before v5.10.46
uvi.description:
sch_cake: Fix out of bounds when parsing TCP options and header

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.46 by commit 3b491dd593d582ceeb27aa617600712a6bd14246, it was introduced in version v4.19 by commit 8b7138814f29933898ecd31dfc83e35a30ee69f5. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: sch_cake: Fix out of bounds when parsing TCP options and header
